title: New date set for postponed exam in Jhelum
content:
RAWALPINDI, Oct 21 (APP):The Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education (BISE) Rawalpindi has announced a new schedule for the English Compulsory paper of the Matric Second Annual Examinations 2025, which was postponed in Jhelum district.

The exam, delayed on October 13 due to security issues and road blockages, will now take place on Wednesday, October 22, in the morning session. It will be held only in Jhelum district, using the same roll numbers and assigned exam centers as originally planned, says the notification issued by the education board.

Controller Exams Tanveer Asghar Awan urged all students to ensure reporting to their centers on time to avoid any delays.

The board advised the students to visit official website of the education board or to contact Assistant Controller Metric Ziyafat Abbasi at 0300-9100331.
